status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I got the issue below when i tried to update my Titanium SDK from Appcelerator Studio by clicking on the yellow "updates available" popup on the left bottom of my Studio or by using Help>Check for Titanium SDK updates option.

+There is the issue :+

_Unable to copy "/var/folders/97/z1d8qnpj0lxbf_gcfyjl1t5m0000gn/T/mobilesdk-5.1.2.GA-osx529758449" to "/#" because the destination  directory could not be created_


*For your information*, using de command line {{appc ti sdk install 5.1.2.GA -d}} works fine !

[link stackoverflow question|https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35451459/titanium-5-1-2-ga-sdk-update-failed]
fields.summary: Unable to update Titanium SDK to 5.1.2.GA

comments.body:
Hello,

I tested the issue you reported. I have updated the titanium SDK by using Help>Check Appcelerator Updates without any error.

Please check the [screenshot|http://postimg.org/image/3xvflewt3/].

Thanks
The issue is not reproducible in our end. Closing the ticket. Thanks.
